oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Larry Nichols interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Larry Nichols served in-country from June 1966 to June 1968, and was a cavalry platoon leader. This interview was conducted Sept. 17, 2020, at Burgess State Park by Billy Minser and Ed Caudill
